Package sait.bms.managers

Class BookManagementSystem

java.lang.Object
sait.bms.managers.BookManagementSystem
public class BookManagementSystem
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BookManagementSystem()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void checkOutBooks​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.util.Scanner kbrd)
    checkOutBooks() - Asks the user for the ISBN, searches through the arraylist for a books that matches the ISBN and looks for how many are available, and if there is one it substracts one from the books available and prints how many are left
    static int display​(java.util.Scanner kbrd)
    display() - displays the menu and asks for an option
    static void displayBooksType​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.util.Scanner kbrd)
    displayBooksType() - Asks for a type of book and then according to the type of book it asks for either format, Diet, Genre or Frequency and displays the books that match the criteria
    static void generateRandomBooks​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.util.Scanner kbrd)
    generateRandomBooks() - Asks for a number of Books to print and prints books at random from the arraylist of books
    static void loadBooks​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.lang.String fileLocation)
    loadBooks() - Opens the file books.txt, scans each one of the entries and creates an object for each entry with corresponding attributes and adds the object to an arraylist
    static void saveChangesToFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.lang.String fileLocation)
    saveChangesToFile() - Prints the arraylist of books into the same .txt file to save the book available amounts
    static void searchBooks​(java.util.ArrayList<Book> bList, java.util.Scanner kbrd)
    searchBooks() - Searches through the arraylist using the ISBN and prints the attributes of the object that match the user input

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
